Name: familial erythrocytosis 2
Definition: A primary polycythemia that has_material_basis_in homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in the VHL gene (608537) on chromosome 3p25.

Name: familial erythrocytosis 1
Definition: A primary polycythemia that has_material_basis_in mutation in the gene encoding the erythropoietin receptor. It is characterized by increased serum red blood cell mass and hemoglobin concentration

Name: familial erythrocytosis 5
Definition: A primary polycythemia characterized by autosomal dominant inheritance that has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutation in the EPO gene on chromosome 7q21.

Name: familial erythrocytosis 3
Definition: A primary polycythemia that has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutation in the EGLN1 gene on chromosome 1q42.

Name: familial erythrocytosis 4
Definition: A primary polycythemia that has_material_basis_in autosomal dominant inheritance of gain-of-function mutations in the EPAS1 gene on chromosome 2p21.

Name: obsolete X-linked dominant disease
Definition: A primary polycythemia that has_material_basis_in autosomal dominant inheritance of gain-of-function mutations in the EPAS1 gene on chromosome 2p21.

Name: obsolete X-linked recessive disease
Definition: A primary polycythemia that has_material_basis_in autosomal dominant inheritance of gain-of-function mutations in the EPAS1 gene on chromosome 2p21.
